pages.text: During your explorations you were hit by arrows again and again, only to completely miss your enemy while looking around in panic - if it hasn't already disappeared behind the next corner already.$(br2)When you get hit, the Gleaming Pin emits a magic surge that passes through walls and attaches to nearby creatures so you can easily track them down.

pages.title: Sniping
pages.text: Enchanting the Gleaming Pin with Sniping allows the surge to pierce even more matter, further increasing its range.
